title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4300.9 - Wagering explanations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4300.9 - Wagering explanations

State Regulations
(a) An
authorized pari-mutuel wagering entity shall include the following information
in the official live programs and simulcast programs and post in conspicuous
places on authorized pari-mutuel wagering entity grounds: (1)
a general explanation of pari-mutuel
wagering; (2)
an explanation of
each type of pari-mutuel wagering pool offered; and
(3)
the expiration date of mutuel
tickets. (b) Wagering
explanations must be approved by the commission before publication. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4300.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
